text: Like many other academic professional societies, the American Statistical Association (ASA) uses the title of Fellow of the American Statistical Association as its highest honorary grade of membership. The number of new fellows per year is limited to one third of one percent of the membership of the ASA. , the people that have been named as Fellows are listed below.ASA Fellows List , accessed 2016-11-04. ==Fellows== ===1914=== * John Lee Coulter * Miles Menander Dawson * Frank H.
